ygData.subject: Punishments
ygData.msgSnippet: Staying true to my warning of moderation: Dcoburn and JP are now moderated for continuing the argument over the board after I warned everyone not to. I m not

Subject: Punishments
Message-ID: <9b2q7k+o5cq@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 695
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Yanshosh@...

Staying true to my warning of moderation:

Dcoburn and JP are now moderated for continuing the argument over the
board after I warned everyone not to. I'm not sure if the punishment
sentance will be a period of time or until they send out an apology
letter (over private email to everyone) or the duration of the battle
or what, but for now I guess we'll continue without them. If anyone
has a good idea of how they can earn free-posting privilages again,
please email it to me.

Please send any posts having to do with this argument over private
email from now on. Dcoburn and JP, I mean nothing personal by
moderating you guys, I'm just trying to keep the peace. I hope we can
remain friends.
